description:
Cozy, comfy and just the right amount of colourful. With their strong retro vibe, the Microdini taps into some of Patagonia’s classic designs. Blending the lightweight warmth of the Micro D, with the wind stopping power the Houdini, this pullover layers well and adds a little toasty style wherever you need it.

  • Body is made from a lightweight recycled polyester velour fleece
  • Collar, pocket, and piping are made from recycled nylon ripstop with a PFC-free DWR
  • Single zippered chest pocket is ready for your sunnies and a bit of cash
  • Fair Trade Certified sewing
  • Regular fit
name: Patagonia Microdini 1/2 Zip Pullover - Men's
